// èŒƒå‹ç±»
public class Test<T>{
    private T a;

    public Test(T _a){
        this.a = _a;
    }

    private T getA(){
        return this.a;
    } 
}

// ä½¿ç”¨
Test<String> test = new Test<>("abc);

// èŒƒå‹æ¥å£
public interface Test<T>{
    T doSomeThing();
}

public class TestA<T> implements Test<T>{
    @Override
    public T doSomeThing() {
        return null;
    }
}

public class TestB implements Test<String> {
    
    @Override
    public String doSomeThing() {
        return "abc";
    }
}

// èŒƒå‹æ–¹æ³•
public <E> void doOtherThing(E e){
}

åå°„

åå°„å°±æ˜¯é€šè¿‡æŸä¸ªç±»çš„Classå¯¹è±¡ï¼Œè·å¾—Classçš„Method å’Œ Field
ç„¶åé€šè¿‡ Method/Field çš„ invokeï¼Œè°ƒç”¨å…·ä½“çš„å¯¹è±¡çš„æ–¹æ³•å’Œæ›´æ–°å¯¹è±¡çš„æ•°æ®ã€‚

public static void main(String[] args) throws InvocationTargetException, IllegalAccessException, NoSuchFieldException {
    // è·å– orderItem çš„ class
    Class<OrderItem> orderItemClass = OrderItem.class;
    // åˆ›å»ºå¯¹è±¡
    OrderItem orderItem = new OrderItem();

    // è·å–æ‰€æœ‰çš„å…¬æœ‰æ–¹æ³•
    Method[] methods = orderItemClass.getMethods();
    for(Method method : methods){
        // è®¾ç½®çŠ¶æ€
        if(method.getName().equals("setStatus")){
            method.invoke(orderItemDetailDTO, 8);
        }
    }

    // è·å–ç§æœ‰å­—æ®µ
    Field orderStatus = orderItemDetailDTOClass.getDeclaredField("status");
    // è®¾ç½®å¯è®¿é—®
    orderItemStatus.setAccessible(true);

    // è·å–å­—æ®µå€¼
    Integer statusVal = (Integer) orderItemStatus.get(orderItemDetailDTO);
    System.out.println(statusVal);
}

æ€ä¹ˆä½¿ç”¨SPI

é¦–å…ˆè°ƒç”¨æ–¹å®šä¹‰æ¥å£å’Œæ–¹æ³•
æœåŠ¡æ–¹æä¾›å®ç°é€»è¾‘ï¼Œåœ¨æœåŠ¡æ–¹çš„ META-INF/service ä¸‹æä¾›æä¾›ä¸€ä¸ªæ–‡ä»¶ï¼Œæ–‡ä»¶åæ˜¯æ¥å£çš„å…¨é™å®šåï¼Œé‡Œè¾¹å†…å®¹æ˜¯æ¥å£çš„å®ç°ç±»ã€‚
è°ƒç”¨æ–¹å¼•å…¥æœåŠ¡æ–¹jaråŒ…ï¼Œé€šè¿‡ ServiceLoader ç±»å°±å¯ä»¥åŠ è½½åˆ°å®ç°ç±»
è¿™æ˜¯JDKçš„é»˜è®¤çº¦å®šï¼Œå› ä¸ºåœ¨ java.util.ServiceLoader ä¸­å†™æ­»äº†æ–‡ä»¶ä½ç½® META-INF/services

ä¸€ä¸ªæ¡†æ¶æƒ³æä¾›ä¸€ä¸ª starter å°±å®šä¹‰ä¸€äº›é…ç½®å¯¹è±¡ï¼Œç„¶åæŠŠé…ç½®å¯¹è±¡å…¨é™å®šåæ”¾å…¥ META-INF/resource/spring.factories ä¸­ï¼Œ

ä»£ç†

é™æ€ä»£ç†

1ï¼Œå®ç°è¢«ä»£ç†å¯¹è±¡çš„æ¥å£
2ï¼Œå®ç°è¢«ä»£ç†å¯¹è±¡æ¥å£ï¼Œå®šä¹‰çš„æ–¹æ³•
3ï¼Œå¼•å…¥è¢«ä»£ç†å¯¹è±¡
4ï¼Œåœ¨ä»£ç†å¯¹è±¡çš„æ–¹æ³•å…§ï¼Œå¯ä»¥æ·»åŠ å¢å¼ºçš„é€»è¾‘ï¼Œç„¶åè°ƒç”¨è¢«ä»£ç†å¯¹è±¡çš„æ–¹æ³•ã€‚

åŠ¨æ€ä»£ç†

1ï¼ŒJDK åŠ¨æ€ä»£ç† è¢«ä»£ç†å¯¹è±¡æœ‰æ¥å£ï¼Œä½¿ç”¨JDK Proxy

// æ¥å£
public interface DemoInter {

    void test();
}

// å®ç°ç±»
public class DemoClass implements DemoInter{

    @Override
    public void test() {
        System.out.println("test");
    }
}

// æµ‹è¯•
public class Demo {

    public static void main(String[] args) {
        // è¢«ä»£ç†å¯¹è±¡
        DemoInter demo = new DemoClass();

        // ä»£ç†å¯¹è±¡
        DemoInter demo1 = (DemoInter) Proxy.newProxyInstance(demo.getClass().getClassLoader(), demo.getClass().getInterfaces(), new InvocationHandler() {
            @Override
            public Object invoke(Object proxy, Method method, Object[] args) throws Throwable {
                System.out.println(1);
                Object res = method.invoke(demo, args);
                System.out.println(2);
                return res;
            }
        });

        // æ‰§è¡Œæµ‹è¯•
        demo1.test();
    }
}

2,CGLIB è¢«ä»£ç†å¯¹è±¡æ²¡æœ‰æ¥å£ï¼Œåˆ™ä½¿ç”¨ CGLIB ç”Ÿæˆä»£ç†å¯¹è±¡

å¼•å…¥ä¾èµ–
<dependency>
  <groupId>cglib</groupId>
  <artifactId>cglib</artifactId>
  <version>3.3.0</version>
</dependency>

// demo ç±»
public class DemoClass {

    public void test() {
        System.out.println("test");
    }
}

// æ³¨æ„è¿™ä¸€æ®µä»£ç åœ¨ jdk9 ä¹‹åä¼šæŠ¥é”™ã€‚
public class Demo {

    public static void main(String[] args) {

        Enhancer enhancer = new Enhancer();
        enhancer.setClassLoader(DemoClass.class.getClassLoader());
        enhancer.setSuperclass(DemoClass.class);
        enhancer.setCallback(new MethodInterceptor() {
            @Override
            public Object intercept(Object o, Method method, Object[] objects, MethodProxy methodProxy) throws Throwable {
                System.out.println(1);
                Object ob = methodProxy.invokeSuper(o, args);
                System.out.println(2);
                return ob;
            }
        });

        DemoClass o = (DemoClass) enhancer.create();
        o.test();
        System.out.println(1);
    }
}

å¯¹æ¯”

1ï¼ŒJDK proxy å¿…é¡»å®ç°æ¥å£ï¼ŒCGLIB ä¸å¿…ï¼Œå› ä¸º CGLIB æ˜¯é€šè¿‡ç”Ÿæˆä¸€ä¸ªè¢«ä»£ç†ç±»çš„å­ç±»æ¥è¿›è¡Œä»£ç†çš„ï¼Œå› æ­¤ä¸èƒ½ä»£ç†å£°æ˜ä¸º final ç±»å‹çš„ç±»å’Œæ–¹æ³•ã€‚ 2ï¼ŒJDK proxy æ•ˆç‡æ¯”è¾ƒé«˜ 3ï¼ŒåŠ¨æ€ä»£ç†åœ¨è¿è¡Œæ—¶ï¼Œæ‰ç”Ÿæˆä»£ç†ç±»å­—èŠ‚ç ï¼Œå¹¶åŠ è½½åˆ° JVM ä¸­çš„ã€‚

æä¾›ä¸€äº›ä¸å®‰å…¨çš„æ“ä½œï¼Œä¾‹å¦‚ç³»ç»Ÿå†…å­˜ç›´æ¥è®¿é—®ç­‰ï¼Œä¸»è¦æ˜¯è°ƒç”¨ä¸€äº› Native æ–¹æ³•ã€‚

å¯¹è±¡æ“ä½œ

public class Demo {

    private int test;

    public static void main(String[] args) throws Exception{
        Unsafe unsafe = getUnsafe();
        assert unsafe != null;
        long offset = unsafe.objectFieldOffset(Demo.class.getDeclaredField("test"));
        Demo demo = new Demo();
        System.out.println(demo.test);
        unsafe.putInt(demo, offset, 42);
        System.out.println(demo.test);
        System.out.println(unsafe.getInt(demo, offset));
    }

    private static Unsafe getUnsafe() {
        try {
            Field field = Unsafe.class.getDeclaredField("theUnsafe");
            field.setAccessible(true);
            return (Unsafe) field.get(null);
        } catch (Exception e) {
            e.printStackTrace();
            return null;
        }
    }

}

æ•°ç»„æ“ä½œ

public native int arrayIndexScale(Class<?> arrayClass);

// Jdkä¸­çš„é” AQS å¾ˆå¤šç”¨åˆ°çº¿ç¨‹æ“ä½œ å’Œ CAS
// AQS é€šè¿‡ LockSupport.park() å’Œ LockSupport.unpark() å®ç°çº¿ç¨‹çš„é˜»å¡å’Œå”¤é†’çš„ï¼Œåº•å±‚å°±æ˜¯è°ƒç”¨ Unsafe çš„ parkã€unparkã€‚

public class Demo{
    public static void main(String[] args) {
    
        Thread curThread = Thread.currentThread();
        new Thread(()->{
            try {
                TimeUnit.SECONDS.sleep(10);
                System.out.println("10ç§’åå”¤èµ·ä¸»çº¿ç¨‹");
                unsafe.unpark(curThread);
            } catch (InterruptedException e) {
                e.printStackTrace();
            }
        }).start();

        System.out.println("æŒ‚èµ·å½“å‰çº¿ç¨‹");
        unsafe.park(false, 0L);
        System.out.println("ä¸»çº¿ç¨‹è¢«å”¤é†’");
    }
}

//è·å–é™æ€å±æ€§çš„åç§»é‡
public native long staticFieldOffset(Field f);
//è·å–é™æ€å±æ€§çš„å¯¹è±¡æŒ‡é’ˆ
public native Object staticFieldBase(Field f);
//åˆ¤æ–­ç±»æ˜¯å¦éœ€è¦åˆå§‹åŒ–ï¼ˆç”¨äºè·å–ç±»çš„é™æ€å±æ€§å‰è¿›è¡Œæ£€æµ‹ï¼‰
public native boolean shouldBeInitialized(Class<?> c);


@Data
public class Demo {
    public static String aa= "Demo";
    int bb;
}

private void staticTest() throws Exception {
    Demo demo = new Demo();
    // ä¹Ÿå¯ä»¥ç”¨ä¸‹é¢çš„è¯­å¥è§¦å‘ç±»åˆå§‹åŒ–
    // 1.
    // unsafe.ensureClassInitialized(User.class);
    // 2.
    // System.out.println(User.name);
    System.out.println(unsafe.shouldBeInitialized(Demo.class));
    Field aField = User.class.getDeclaredField("aa");
    long fieldOffset = unsafe.staticFieldOffset(aField);
    Object fieldBase = unsafe.staticFieldBase(aField);
    Object object = unsafe.getObject(fieldBase, fieldOffset);
    System.out.println(object);
}
